quizDescription: Test your knowledge about the game of soccer and its history!
quizTags: Soccer, Football, Sports, Players, World Cup

questions.question: Which country won the first-ever FIFA World Cup in 1930?
questions.explanation: Uruguay won the first-ever FIFA World Cup in 1930, which was held in Montevideo, Uruguay.

questions.question: Who is the all-time leading goal scorer in men's FIFA World Cup history?
questions.explanation: Marta from Brazil is the all-time leading goal scorer in men's and women's FIFA World Cup history.

questions.question: Which club team has won the most UEFA Champions League titles?
questions.explanation: Real Madrid, from Spain, holds the record for the most UEFA Champions League titles, with 13 championships as of the 2021-2022 season.

questions.question: Which player is often referred to as 'The King of Football' and is considered one of the greatest soccer players of all time?
questions.explanation: Pele from Brazil is often referred to as 'The King of Football' and is considered one of the greatest soccer players of all time.

questions.question: In soccer, how many players from each team are allowed on the field during gameplay?
questions.explanation: In soccer, each team is allowed to have 11 players on the field during gameplay, including one goalkeeper.

questions.question: Which player has won the most Ballon d'Or awards, given to the best soccer player in the world?
questions.explanation: Lionel Messi from Argentina holds the record for the most Ballon d'Or awards, having won the prestigious honor multiple times.

questions.question: Which national team has won the most FIFA World Cup titles?
questions.explanation: Brazilian national team has won the most FIFA World Cup titles, with a record 5 championships as of the 2022 World Cup.

questions.question: Which country hosted the first Women's FIFA World Cup in 1991?
questions.explanation: China hosted the first-ever Women's FIFA World Cup in 1991, marking a significant milestone in women's soccer history.

questions.question: In soccer, what is the term used for a situation where a player scores three goals in a single game?
questions.explanation: In soccer, when a player scores three goals in a single game, it is called a 'Hat-Trick,' a term borrowed from cricket.

questions.question: Which player is known as 'The Egyptian King' and plays for Liverpool in the English Premier League?
questions.explanation: Mohamed Salah from Egypt is known as 'The Egyptian King' and plays as a forward for Liverpool in the English Premier League.
